title: PT 2: Should She Read Her Deceased Mom's Private Diary?
description:
Her mom passed away and she and her sister aren't seeing eye-to-eye on her private journals. In real life, her mom would hide her diaries and NEVER wanted anyone to read them. However, her sister says mom is gone and reading them would keep her memory alive. Who's right?
